sentences.sContent: When the bag is folded, the bottom overlaps one side.
sentences.sCn: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

sentences.sContent: Overlap the slices carefully so there are no gaps.
sentences.sCn: 把薄片小心地叠放在一起，那样就没有间隙。

remMethod.val: over(在…上) + lap(大腿) → 把一条腿放在另一条腿上 → 重叠

trans.tranOther: If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap.
